DOC.brief_summary: Phase I : Focus group different design adjustable glass standard glass ( August-September 2012 ) Phase II : Two-month randomized trial compare four group : ( September 2012 - August 2013 )
DOC.detailed_description: Phase I : Focus group different design adjustable glass standard glass ( August-September 2012 ) Phase II : Two-month randomized trial compare four group : self-refraction adjustable glass , receive custom standard glass ; subjective refraction expert refractionist cycloplegic automate refraction receive custom standard glass ; subjective refraction rural refractionist cycloplegic automate refraction , receive custom standard glass ; subjective refraction expert refractionist cycloplegic automate refraction receive ready make glass ( September 2012 - August 2013 )
